metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9269 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In libzypp before August 2018 GPG keys attached to YUM repositories werenot correctly pinned, allowing malicious repository mirrors to silentlydowngrade to unsigned repositories with potential malicious content.

criterions.comment: libzypp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
